alert.note: Alert for Minnehaha; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 1:03AM MDT until May 30 at 1:45AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR ROCK...WESTERN NOBLES...WESTERN MURRAY...PIPESTONE...MOODY AND EASTERN MINNEHAHA COUNTIES... At 201 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Aurora to near Brandon, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Instrumentation. At 2:00 AM, the ASOS in Sioux Falls, South Dakota recorded a wind gust of 69 mph. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Brandon, Flandreau, Corson, Rowena and Palisades State Park around 205 AM CDT. Garretson, Valley Springs and Sherman around 210 AM CDT. Hills, Beaver Creek and Ward around 215 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Pipestone, Hardwick, Pipestone National Monument, Luverne, Holland, Blue Mounds State Park, Ellsworth, Ruthton, Woodstock, Adrian, Lake Wilson, Lismore, Rushmore, Wilmont and Current Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern and east central South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
